meanings.definition: A person who practices or advocates a particular posture or set of postures.
meanings.sent1: The posturists in the yoga class demonstrated various poses.
meanings.sent2: The posturists at the gym always stand up straight.
meanings.sent3: The posturists at the park were trying to balance on one leg, looking like flamingos.
meanings.sent4: She moved gracefully, like a group of posturists in a synchronized dance.
meanings.sent5: The posturists in the ballet troupe held their positions with elegance and precision.

meanings.sent1: The posturists gathered for a meeting to discuss their shared beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The posturists were all wearing matching uniforms at the event.
meanings.sent3: The posturists formed a line, each one adjusting their posture to match the person in front.
meanings.sent4: The posturists moved in unison, creating a mesmerizing display of coordination.
meanings.sent5: Among the posturists, there was a sense of unity and purpose in their actions.
